title: The Forgotten toys
creator_credit: Graham Ralph, Karen Davidsen and Herbert Raplh Entertainment Company
brief_description: Joanna Lumley and Bob Hoskins are the voices of Annie, a refined rag doll and Teddy, a gruff old bear, in this adapatation of James Stevenson’s book “The Night after Christmas.” The two are discarded by their owners when they receive new toys and are determined to escape from the dustbin to find new children who will love them. A delightful animated tale of friendship and hope.
